entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
